title: SCP-3939-5
content:
[[div class="scp-image-block block-right" style="width: 300px;"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-3939/scp.jpg style="width: 300px;"]]
[[div class="scp-image-caption" style="width: 300px;"]]
IMG_201802280039.JPG
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

**Item #:** SCP-3939

[[include :scp-wiki:fragment:util-scp-3939-object-class]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** Object is kept in standard pre-containment holding cell. A researcher is to be assigned to classify it as soon as possible.

**Description:** None yet available.

[[div class="story"]]
"No." you tell her.

You are strong and independent. You don't need her to tell you what to do.

"You may be my superior, but remember, a few days ago we were both Class 4. Remember your place when talking to me."

Her expression does not change.

"If it weren't for me, what you did with SCP-████ would have gotten you fired on the spot. I was the only one arguing to get you a second chance. Do you understand me? The //only// one. Do you know what that means? Do you have any idea how many people //aren't// on your side, who can't //ever// be?"

You pause, at a loss for words. "I'm sorry."

She shakes her head. "No. After this, you're done with the Foundation. Write up the article."

You shrink into your seat.

[[div class="choices"]]
[/scp-3939/offset/11 Publish the work.]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
author: Croquembouche
